item.title: Java/Kotlin Expert Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Java/Kotlin expert to join our team. As an expert in both Java and Kotlin, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality, efficient, and scalable applications. You should have a strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles and be comfortable working with complex algorithms and data structures. The ideal candidate will have experience working with frameworks such as Spring Boot and Android Studio. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently are also essential for this role.

Skills required:
- Java
- Kotlin
- Object-oriented programming
- Spring Boot
- Android Studio
- Problem-solving

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.

Expertise level: Expert

Hourly Range: $30.00-$54.00
Posted On: July 19, 2024 04:41 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Java, Kotlin, Android, Android App Development, Smartphone
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
Looking for someone to go through Draw.io src code and remove the file extension to XML. Review the src code on GitHub (https://github.com/jgraph/drawio) before responding. It is an easy work but a long one to replace all current file extension to XML, therefore contracting out. Please know that this has a legacy codebase, which is why I urge you to review the src code before responding. More work will be allocated if the job is done asap. We want this done by Sunday, California time.

Budget: $20

item.title: Bespoke Trading Algorithm for Platform - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced developer to design and implement a bespoke & Secure trading algorithm for our platform. The algorithm will focus on perpetual autonomous auctions, handling both buy and sell sides effectively.

Responsibilities:
- Develop a custom trading algorithm tailored to our specific requirements.
- Implement and optimize the algorithm to ensure efficient and accurate trading.
- Collaborate with our team to integrate the algorithm into our existing platform.
- Provide documentation and support for the developed solution.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in developing trading algorithms.
- Strong understanding of perpetual autonomous auctions.
- Proficiency in relevant programming languages and technologies.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Previous experience in the financial technology sector.
- Familiarity with our platform's technology stack.

How to Apply:
Please submit your resume, a brief cover letter explaining your relevant experience, and examples of previous work related to trading algorithms.

We look forward to hearing from you!


Posted On: July 19, 2024 03:29 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Python, JavaScript, C#, Java, Algorithm Development, PHP, C++, Web Development, Machine Learning
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Improve current MQL4/5 EA & add hedging also - Upwork
item.description:
Description of Current Trading Algorithm Strategy
I currently run a grid trading strategy on my Expert Advisor (EA). Here is an overview of how the strategy works:

Trigger for Trades: The opening of trades is dictated by candle closures. Specifically:
A bearish candle results in a sell order.
A bullish candle results in a buy order.
Multiplicator and Fixed Lot: Each subsequent order uses a multiplicator and a fixed lot size.
Step and Take Profit: There is a predetermined step between orders, and a take profit (TP) level is set for each trade.
No Stop Loss: Currently, no stop loss is used in this strategy.
Improvement Goals
I want to improve the strategy to:

Limit risk while maintaining a profitability rate of 5-15% per month.
Implement a hard stop loss based on a percentage of the account's equity.
Integrate hedging to manage drawdown and profit when the EA is on the wrong side of the market, awaiting a retracement to hit the TP.
Request for Expert Input
Job Description:
I am seeking an experienced trading algorithm developer to help improve my grid trading strategy. The goals of the project are to:

Limit Risk: Advise on best practices for limiting risk while maintaining a profitability rate of 5-15% per month.
Implement Hard Stop Loss: Develop and implement a hard stop loss based on a set percentage of the account's equity. Provide recommendations on the appropriate percentage.
Integrate Hedging: Develop a hedging mechanism to manage drawdown and profit when the EA is on the wrong side of the market. Provide guidance on effectively integrating hedging into the existing strategy.
Requirements:

Proven experience in developing and improving trading algorithms, particularly grid strategies.
Strong understanding of risk management techniques.
Expertise in implementing stop loss and hedging mechanisms.
Ability to maintain or improve the current profitability rate of 5-15% per month.
Deliverables:

Detailed plan and implementation of risk limitation strategies.
Implementation of a hard stop loss feature based on equity percentage.
Development and integration of an effective hedging mechanism.
Documentation and explanation of all changes made to the strategy.
Looking forward to your inputs on how we can improve the EA and the best way to implement hedging.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$85.00
Posted On: July 19, 2024 02:09 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:MQL 4, MetaTrader 4, MQL 5, Forex Trading, Financial Analysis, Java
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Upgrade dart to 3.2 in vs code - Upwork
item.description:
I'm working on a mobile application project and there is an issue when running: run pub.get. There are more than 800 problems. There is an error message that I need to upgrade my current Dart version from 3.1 to 3.2 or later in VS Code. Unfortunately, when i have tried to upgrade the system goes to the old version again.  I don't know to upgrade to Dart 3.2 or later and I'm unsure how to resolve.

Key Requirements:
- Upgrade Dart version from 3.1 to 3.2 or later in VS Code without causing any issues in my existing codebase.
- Resolve any errors or issues that may arise during the upgrade process and run well the run pub.get without errors.

Budget: $22
Posted On: July 18, 2024 22:48 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Dart, Java, Android, C++, Android App Development
Country: Mexico
click to apply

item.title: Angular JS and Spring Boot UI developer needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced UI developer that is skilled in AngularJS,  Javascript, APIs to complete and enhance a sophisticated Energy IOT platform dashboard that we have built for end-to-end monitoring, control and management of Renewable Microgrids and Aggregates of such Microgrids. These Microgrids could consist of Solar, Battery Storage, Gensets, EV Chargers and Thermostats deployed at various sites. OpenEGrid UI architects and engineering team have already built out the new dashboard required for this purpose, however, there are bug fixes needed, feature upgrades and minor changes to the charts and options from time to time based on customer/user feedback. We would like to bring in a skilled developer who has implemented or supported a sophisticated UI dashboard for such complex projects (not necessarily related  to Energy IOT or Microgrids) , with experience implementing/supporting such AngularJS and Spring Boot based frameworks.
We would like to hire right away if we find the right candidate. Our company is based in California, USA.   
   

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 20:28 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:AngularJS, CSS, JavaScript, Java, API
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Software Development FinTech API - Upwork
item.description:
MurkingStocks aims to revolutionize stock analysis by providing a user-friendly yet professional platform that integrates real-time financial data, customizable portfolio management tools, and AI-powered insightful reports, empowering investors to make informed decisions with confidence.

Help develop a real time stock analysis tool. 1. Launch a user-friendly web and mobile platform for stock analysis.
2. Integrate real-time financial data from sources like Yahoo Finance, Bloomberg, and Apple Stock News.
3. Implement AI features for article summarization and sentiment analysis.
4. Provide personalized portfolio management tools with easy customization options.


Front-end: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Next.js, TailwindCSS, DaisyUI, Bootstrap
Back-end: Express.js, Node.js, Django, Flask, Firebase
Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL
APIs: REST, GraphQL, SOAP, gRPC

Machine Learning: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn, Keras, Pandas, NumPy
AI: Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision, Reinforcement Learning, OpenAI GPT, IBM Watson, Azure AI

Automation: Selenium, Ansible, Jenkins, Puppeteer, Docker, Kubernetes
CRM & ERP: Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho CRM, SAP ERP, Odoo, Microsoft Dynamics 365

Algorithmic Trading: Python (pandas, NumPy, matplotlib, TA-Lib), QuantConnect, MetaTrader 4/5, Interactive Brokers API, Backtrader, Zipline

Budget: $300
Posted On: July 18, 2024 20:20 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:API, JavaScript, RESTful API, Node.js, Database Architecture, Java, PHP, API Integration, FinTech, API Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: WordPress Plugin Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced WordPress Specialist to manage and maintain updates for our extensive WordPress multisite network. Our network comprises hundreds of sites that require regular updates to WordPress versions, plugins, themes, and potentially custom code to ensure smooth functionality and security.

Responsibilities:
• WordPress Version Updates: Ensure that all sites within the multisite network are running the latest stable version of WordPress.
• Plugin Updates: Update and maintain all plugins across the network, ensuring compatibility and functionality.
• Theme Updates: Update themes across all sites, addressing any compatibility issues that arise.
• Code Updates: Review and update custom code to maintain functionality and compatibility with new versions of WordPress, plugins, and themes.
• Automation Implementation: Develop and implement an automated system for future updates to ensure seamless integration and minimal downtime.
• Quality Assurance: Be meticulous and detail-oriented to ensure that our clients’ sites are not damaged, hindered, or experience downtime during the updating process.

Requirements:
• Proficiency in WordPress: Extensive experience with WordPress multisite networks, including version updates, plugin management, and theme updates.
• Coding Skills: Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL. Ability to troubleshoot and update custom code as needed.
• Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to identify, troubleshoot, and resolve issues that arise during updates.
• Attention to Detail: Ensure that all updates are thoroughly tested and implemented without disrupting site functionality.
• Automation Experience: Experience in setting up automated systems for updates.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience with Large Networks: Prior experience managing updates for large WordPress multisite networks.
• Security Knowledge: Understanding of WordPress security best practices to ensure that updates do not compromise site security.
• Communication Skills: Ability to communicate effectively with our team regarding progress, issues, and solutions.

If you are a WordPress expert with a proven track record in managing large multisite networks and are looking for a challenging and rewarding opportunity, we would love to hear from you.
Please submit a cover letter detailing your relevant experience, and examples of previous work or case studies.

Hourly Range: $22.00-$44.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 19:20 UTC
Category: CMS Development
Skills:Java, SQL, WordPress, WordPress Plugin, CSS, PHP, JavaScript, HTML, Plugin Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Wallet Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a talented and experienced Wallet Developer looking for a new and exciting opportunity? Look no further! We are currently seeking a highly skilled individual to join our team as a Wallet Developer.

As a Wallet Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining secure and reliable digital wallets for our users. You will work closely with our team of developers to ensure that our wallets are user-friendly, efficient, and secure.

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in software development, with a focus on blockchain technology and cryptocurrency. You must have experience working with various blockchain platforms, such as Ethereum and Bitcoin, and be familiar with smart contract development.

In addition to technical skills, we are looking for someone who is a team player, has excellent communication skills, and is able to work in a fast-paced environment.

Benefits of this position include competitive salary, opportunities for growth and advancement, and a dynamic and collaborative work environment.

If you are a skilled Wallet Developer looking to take your career to the next level, we want to hear from you. Apply now to join our team and help us revolutionize the world of digital wallets!

Hourly Range: $25.00-$55.00

Category: Mobile App Development

item.content:encoded:
Are you a talented and experienced Wallet Developer looking for a new and exciting opportunity? Look no further! We are currently seeking a highly skilled individual to join our team as a Wallet Developer.

As a Wallet Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining secure and reliable digital wallets for our users. You will work closely with our team of developers to ensure that our wallets are user-friendly, efficient, and secure.

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in software development, with a focus on blockchain technology and cryptocurrency. You must have experience working with various blockchain platforms, such as Ethereum and Bitcoin, and be familiar with smart contract development.

In addition to technical skills, we are looking for someone who is a team player, has excellent communication skills, and is able to work in a fast-paced environment.

Benefits of this position include competitive salary, opportunities for growth and advancement, and a dynamic and collaborative work environment.

If you are a skilled Wallet Developer looking to take your career to the next level, we want to hear from you. Apply now to join our team and help us revolutionize the world of digital wallets!

Hourly Range: $25.00-$55.00

Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Smartphone, Objective-C, Node.js, MySQL, Location-Based Service, Chat & Messaging Software, Tablet, Java, CSS

item.title: Need a mobile application - Upwork
item.description:
Develop a mobile application for our business.

App Functionality: List all the key features and functionalities you envision for your application. Here are some general categories to consider:
- User Accounts: Will users need to create accounts to access the application's core features?
- Content Management: Will the app require content creation or management functionalities?
- User Interaction: Will users interact with each other or the content within the app? (e.g., comments, ratings, messaging)
- Data Storage: What type of data will the app store? (e.g., user profiles, content, preferences)
Push Notifications: Will you use push notifications to keep users engaged?
- Offline Functionality: Can the app function without an internet connection? (partially or fully)
- Monetization Strategy: How will you generate revenue from the app? (subscriptions, in-app purchases, ads)

Budget: $700
Posted On: July 18, 2024 18:40 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:React Native, Flutter, Mobile App Bug Fix, Mobile App Redesign, GraphQL, Java, Kotlin, Android, iOS, Mobile App Development
Country: Pakistan
click to apply

item.title: AI Diagnostic Platform Development Team - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a small development team with expertise in building AI diagnostic platforms for mental health startup. The team should consist of at least 2 experienced fullstack developers and one QA. The goal of this project is to create a user-friendly platform that utilizes AI algorithms to analyze mental health data and provide accurate diagnostic insights. The team will be responsible for developing the platform's frontend and backend components, integrating AI algorithms, conducting thorough testing, and ensuring seamless functionality.

   Key Skills:
   - Proficiency in fullstack development
   - Strong knowledge of AI algorithms and machine learning techniques (the AI portion will be built by CTO onshore team)
   - Experience in system integration, e.g. EHR integration
   - Expertise in frontend and backend development
   - QA testing and debugging skills

   If you are passionate about leveraging technology to improve mental health services and have the required skills, we would love to hear from you!

   Please include your relevant experience and portfolio when applying for this gig.


Posted On: July 18, 2024 18:26 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Python, JavaScript, Artificial Intelligence, API, Java, React
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Full-Stack Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a talented Full-Stack Developer looking to take on a new challenge? We are seeking a highly skilled individual to join our team and help us in creating innovative solutions that will drive our business forward.

As a Full-Stack Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining both the front-end and back-end of our web applications. You will work closely with our team of designers and developers to ensure a seamless user experience and efficient functionality. Your role will involve writing clean, reusable code, implementing new features, and troubleshooting any issues that arise.

To be successful in this role, you must have a solid understanding of both front-end and back-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and databases such as MySQL. You should also have experience working with frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work well in a team are essential.

In return for your hard work, we offer competitive compensation, opportunities for professional development, and a collaborative work environment. Join us and be a part of a dynamic team that is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of technology.

If you are a passionate Full-Stack Developer looking to make a difference, we want to hear from you. Apply now and take the next step in your career!

Hourly Range: $15.00-$70.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 17:48 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:API, Java, WordPress, Database Design, Android, C#, Custom PHP, React, Amazon Web Services
Country: Germany

item.title: Sr. Java and AWS Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Hello. I need to build a backend application. It will be developed using Java and hosted using the AWS Amplify service. we will use Cognito, AWS’ directory and authentication service, to manage user accounts and access privileges.
All data that needs to be persisted is stored in AWS RDS (Relational Database Service).

- Key design principles
Our review of the scope of work (SOW) and our experience with and understanding of the history and current state of the ASAP service led us to a summary of the key design principles:
• Serverless
• Standards-based
• A stateless messaging hub/service bus
• Transient storage
• Rules-based routing
• Loosed-coupled microservices
• Internet-based security and encryption

I attached the AWS architecture as a screenshot below, you need to create lambda functions with Java and deploy them to AWS.

You need to work in US business hours like 10am - 5pm EST.
Let me know if you can do it.

Thanks.

Hourly Range: $9.00-$12.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 16:20 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:AWS Lambda, AWS Amplify, Java, Amazon Web Services, Amazon Cognito, Amazon CloudWatch, Amazon RDS, Terraform
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Integrate new database driver into node-jdbc-connection - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a skilled Node.JS developer with experience in Java and JDBC?
Then here's a quick but interesting task for you.

What's the task?
- There is this Github repo here: https://github.com/moononournation/node-jdbc-connection/
- This Github repo allows to connect to certain databases via JDBC
- However, we'd need to connect to another database (SAP Advantage) which is not yet supported by this repo. We already have a JDBC driver (as .jar file).
- The goal of this task is that the repo is extended so that we can also connect to the new database using the new .jar driver, perform queries, close connections and handle errors (all functions in main/src/NodeJdbcConnection.js).

Here's the database driver for integration (at the end of the page): https://support.adeptia.com/hc/en-us/articles/207874903-Connecting-to-SQL-Anywhere-10-Datasource

For connecting to the database, it's important that we can define the driver properties (see screenshot).

Why work with us?
- Clear descriptions and goals.
- Quick and effective communication.
- Test environment/database available where you can test your integration.
- No bullshit!



Budget: $750
Posted On: July 18, 2024 15:39 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:Java, JDBC, Node.js, SAP Advantage Database Server
Country: Germany
click to apply
item.content:encoded:

Then here's a quick but interesting task for you.

What's the task?
- There is this Github repo here: https://github.com/moononournation/node-jdbc-connection/
- This Github repo allows to connect to certain databases via JDBC
- However, we'd need to connect to another database (SAP Advantage) which is not yet supported by this repo. We already have a JDBC driver (as .jar file).
- The goal of this task is that the repo is extended so that we can also connect to the new database using the new .jar driver, perform queries, close connections and handle errors (all functions in main/src/NodeJdbcConnection.js).

Here's the database driver for integration (at the end of the page): https://support.adeptia.com/hc/en-us/articles/207874903-Connecting-to-SQL-Anywhere-10-Datasource

For connecting to the database, it's important that we can define the driver properties (see screenshot).

Why work with us?
- Clear descriptions and goals.
- Quick and effective communication.
- Test environment/database available where you can test your integration.
- No bullshit!



Budget: $750

item.title: Setup and development of AI empowered skills management MVP - Upwork
item.description:
We will receive on this week from outsourced specialists a well documented experimential project and small python program which can analyze with AI thousands of skills, course descriptions, professions, persons, skillgaps and their connections/relations.
The most needed features will be:
- Filtering and searching of skills and courses.
- Skills related to course (in two languages)
- Courses related to a skill (in two languages)
- Publishing of skills/course visualization from Neo4J to webpage.
- Recommendation of course to user according his skillgap.

1. Your first job is to receive the documentation and program and setup them to Google or Amazon Cloud environment (during 20.-21. July) for our experimental testing within one week (before 26. July).
2. Secondly you should create and innovate web UI pages according our current visual design for users who want to use above mentioned features. The resulting webpages are for our internal testing.
3. Adding thousands of new skills and professions to the database + analyzing them with AI with above system.
4. Testing the functionality with larger data (100.000 skills).
5. Some time after testing we want to continue working with you to integrate the new features with our current PostqreSQL/Java production environment and processes. Our co-operation with AI specialist can continue also after this.


Hourly Range: $5.00-$25.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 14:33 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Neo4j, PostgreSQL, Java, Google Cloud Platform, Amazon Web Services, Python, API, Web Development, Artificial Intelligence
Country: Finland
click to apply
